1.0.0.name: wordpress/indiewire-player-embed
1.0.0.description:
Use Indiewire Player Embed to embed a Video from Indiewire.com into any page/post on your site.

Embed the Indiewire Player using shortcode '[indiewire id="VIDEO-ID-HERE"]'; replacing 'VIDEO-ID-HERE' with the id of the desired Indiewire Video.

Useful plugins:

  • "iframe" - Use iframe to embed video from YouTube or Vimeo or to embed Google Map or just to embed content from external page with a shortcode.
  • "Embedded Video" - Easy embedding of videos from lots of portals or local video files of many file formats with optional generation of a corresponding link.
